General.Name: Cherry AG
General.Description: Cherry SE, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells computer input devices in Germany. It offers keyboards, mice, desktop sets, USB terminals, card readers, headsets, microphones, mechanical switches, and accessories; and provides software solutions. The company serves office and home office, gaming, healthcare, security, POS, and IOT sectors. It sells its products through distributors, resellers, system houses, retailers, e-tailers, and DTC. Cherry SE was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Auerbach, Germany.
